biotools.summary: Modeling strategy to normalize high-throughput genomic data, converting them into either biological variables that represent the target of the statistical analysis, or adjustment variables that represent factors arising from the experimental or biological setting the data is drawn from. This approach models all study-specific variables simultaneously in order to more accurately characterize the biological or clinical variables of interest.

bioschemas.name: snm
